contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary|HST}} '''HST''' may refer to: In '''science and technology''': * [[Hubble Space Telescope]] * [[Harvard-MIT Division of Health Sciences and Technology]] * [[Herschel Space Telescope]], an alternate name for the Herschel Space Observatory * [[History of science and technology]] * [[High Speed Telegraphy]], a radiosport * [[USRobotics]]' HST (High-Speed Transfer) modem protocol '''Places''': * [[Hospital Santo Tomas]] (Saint Thomas Hospital), a hospital in Panama City, Panama '''Transportation''': * [[Helsinki City Transport]], Swedish abbreviation * [[Heritage Shunters Trust]], a trade name of the South Yorkshire Railway Company * [[High Street (Glasgow) railway station]], Scotland with National Rail station code HST * [[InterCity 125]], a British train often called the High Speed Train * High-Speed Tractor, a military vehicle including the [[M4 Tractor|M4]], [[M5 Tractor|M5]], [[M6 Tractor|M6]] and [[M8 Tractor|M8]], among others '''Other uses''': * [[Harmonized Sales Tax]], in Canada a tax on goods, services and sales * [[Hegemonic stability theory]], a concept in international relations * [[Helicopter support team]], a team of eight landing support Marines * [[Hypertrophy-specific Training]], in weight lifting * [[Hawaiian Standard Time]] {{disambig}}
